thread.title: Toms Shoes Continues to See Shift to Online Sales

author: Soma Biswas
title: Toms Shoes Continues to See Shift to Online Sales
text:
Toms Shoes LLC, the slip-on footwear maker known for its charity work, has been shifting sales to its direct-to-consumer Toms.com website as it looks to survive the disruption roiling the retail industry, according to people familiar with the matter.
The company, founded in 2006 by Blake Mycoskie, is still struggling to with declining sales and profits in brick-and-mortar stores and third-party online platforms while it services $306 million in debt, the people said.
